alert.note: Alert for Washtenaw; Wayne (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 16 at 5:10PM EST by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A BROKEN LINE OF SNOW SHOWERS WILL AFFECT NORTHERN WASHTENAW AND WAYNE COUNTIES DURING THE EVENING COMMUTE... HAZARDS...Snow showers reducing visibility to less than 1 mile and briefly near a quarter of a mile. Light accumulation mainly on unpaved surfaces. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 508 PM EST, the broken line of snow showers extended from Livonia to near Stockbridge and moving east at 20 MPH. THIS AREA OF HEAVY SNOW WILL BE NEAR... Detroit around 520 PM EST. Ann Arbor around 600 PM EST. Ypsilanti and Salem around 630 PM EST. This includes the following highways... I-275 between mile markers 8 and 29. I-96 between mile markers 168 and 192. M-14 between mile markers 1 and 21. US-23 between mile markers 26 and 52. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
